alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 31 at 2:09AM CDT until October 31 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 to 31 expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Arkansas, southeast Oklahoma and northeast Texas. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
